languages.text: "Мне жаль, что тебе пришлось так поступить со своим другом. Ты заслуживал лучшего".
"I am sorry that you had to do that to your friend. You deserved better."
languages.original_text: "Мне жаль, что тебе пришлось так поступить со своим другом. Ты заслуживал лучшего".

traits.locale_text: "I am sorry that you had to do that to your friend. You deserved better."
"I am sorry that you had to do that to your friend. You deserved better."
"I am sorry that you had to do that to your friend. You deserved better."
"I am sorry that you had to do that to your friend. You deserved better."
"I am sorry that you had to do that to your friend. You deserved better."
"I am sorry that you had to do that to your friend. You deserved better."

languages.text: 「友人にそんなことをしなければならなかったなんて…気の毒に思う。君はもっと報われるべきだったよ」
languages.original_text: "I am sorry that you had to do that to your friend. You deserved better."

traits.locale_text: 「友人にそんなことをしなければならなかったなんて…気の毒に思う。君はもっと報われるべきだったよ」

languages.text: "Es tut mir leid, dass Ihr Euch Eurem Freund gegenüber so verhalten musstet. Ihr hattet Besseres verdient."
languages.original_text: "I am sorry that you had to do that to your friend. You deserved better."

traits.locale_text: "Es tut mir leid, dass Ihr Euch Eurem Freund gegenüber so verhalten musstet. Ihr hattet Besseres verdient."

languages.text: « {mf|Navré|Navrée} que vous ayez dû tuer votre ami. Vous ne méritiez pas ça. »
languages.original_text: "I am sorry that you had to do that to your friend. You deserved better."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Navré|Navrée} que vous ayez dû tuer votre ami. Vous ne méritiez pas ça. »

languages.text: «Lamento que tuviese que hacerle eso a su amigo. Merecía algo mejor».
languages.original_text: "I am sorry that you had to do that to your friend. You deserved better."

traits.locale_text: «Lamento que tuviese que hacerle eso a su amigo. Merecía algo mejor».

languages.text: “你不得不杀死你的朋友，我很遗憾。命运本该对你更仁慈些。”
languages.original_text: "I am sorry that you had to do that to your friend. You deserved better."

traits.locale_text: “你不得不杀死你的朋友，我很遗憾。命运本该对你更仁慈些。”

languages.text: "Arkadaş bildiğin insana böyle bir şey yapmak zorunda kalmana çok üzüldüm. Böyle bir şey yaşamayı hak etmemişsin."
languages.original_text: "I am sorry that you had to do that to your friend. You deserved better."

traits.locale_text: "Arkadaş bildiğin insana böyle bir şey yapmak zorunda kalmana çok üzüldüm. Bunu hak etmiyorsun."
